brainly_data.question: Which of the following statements BEST describes Buddy’s friend? A. Fashion is her passion. B. She has strong feelings about God. C. She spends a lot of time at the movies. D. Big cities fascinate her.
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: Which of the following statements BEST describes Buddy’s friend? A. Fashion is her passion. B. She has strong feelings about God. C. She spends a lot of time at the movies. D. Big cities fascinate her.
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: I think your answer here is B. She has strong feelings about God.
